stories.title: Samara
stories.body: Have you ever heard of a videotape that kills everyone who watch it?
stories.author: Tom Denvill

stories.title: Mr Sandman
stories.body: I have heard a lot of incredible stories about a man that brings people dreams, good ones and nightmares
stories.author: Jeremy Klover

stories.title: Diamonds
stories.body: I found that diamond in my uncle's mansion.
stories.author: Jackie

stories.title: Rag
stories.body: Lissie loved this doll. I have never seen my child so happy and caring about something.
stories.author: Samuel Brown
